questions.ques: Which of the following PHP functions can be used for generating unique id’s?

< ?php 
echo "chr(52)";
?>

< ?php 
    echo ord ("hi");
?>

What will be the output of the following PHP code?
< ?php 
    $str = "Hello World"
    echo wordwrap($str,5,"
\n");    
?>
